resources.string: No networks with both frequencies and same SSID found!
Location services need to be enabled!
Wifi already connected with preferred frequency
Please try to configure 5 GHz network with current SSID…
Wifi scan failed - throttling too many scans
Wifi scan failed - Wifi not available
Forces Wifi to switch to 5 GHz channels
Minimum signal level to switch over
Activate or de-activate the functionality to switch automatically the frequency of your Wifi. If disabled, you can still select your preferred Wi-Fis manually.
Choose your preferred frequency - either 2.4 GHz or 5 GHz if supported
Define the minimum signal level to switch over to another frequency. This avoids switching to a weaker network.
Found the following Wifi access points with same SSID and 2.4/5 GHz - trying to switch to preferred one. This may take some time or multiple network switches.
You don\’t have any Wifi access points with both 2.4 and 5 GHz band on same SSID nearby. Please find another Wifi access point with multiple frequencies on the same SSID to make use of this app.

Found the following Wifi access points with same SSID and 2.4/5 GHz - trying to switch to preferred one. Please note: Starting with Android 10 you probably have to disable and then re-connect your Wifi manually!
Choose another network (SSID) with the desired frequency instead of staying with the same SSID
Please re-connect to your Wifi manually or reboot the device to change frequency

I wrote this app to force my devices to the less used 5 GHz channels of my Wifi network.


Unfortunately starting with Android 10, apps cannot force the system to change the Wifi channel, but only give a recommendation to do so.


Therefore this app MAY or MAY NOT work on your device. Please give a try. In certain cases you will have to disable and enable your Wifi manually once or even reboot your device in order to get an effect.

If it\'s not working, just de-install it.


Any feedback is welcome - just drop me an email.

This app requires access to all wireless networks nearby. Therefore Location Services must be enabled in order to retrieve a list of all Wifis. This is a requirement enforced by Android.
Without the app WILL NOT work.

The app will never try to locate your position or similar.
This app requires to display notifications, otherwise functionality may be limited. Please enanble notifications in the app settings.
Error while setting suggestion for wifi
Permission to access Wifis state has been revoked!

Under Android 12+ you will have to disable the Battery Optimizations for this app.


Please open the Settings and grant an exception to this app by selecting the app and choosing Don\'t optimize as well as removing any Background restrictions.

Not disabling battery optimizations may result a forced stop of this app by Android.
Error while setting duplication suggestion for Wifi - try to start app again.
Android did not follow suggestion for Wifi - try to dis-connect and reconnect manually
This app lacks of the required permissions for Location Services and Wifi access. Please open the Settings and grant the necessary permissions.
Open permission settings of app. This app needs permissions for Wifi, Location and Notifications in order to work.
Open location services settings. This app needs location services enabled in order to retrieve a list of all Wifi access points.
Open settings of this app. Use to remove Background Restrictions and fix permissions or battery optimization settings.
Function not supported on your phone

This app requires several permissions settings in order to work properly. Please grant them all:

  1. Access to your location - this is mandatory by Android to determinate all Wifi access points nearby
  2. Enabled location services - and your Location Services must be enabled too
  3. Battery optimization modes should be deactived to keep the app running in background
  4. … and you may be asked when the app proposes another Wifi. Please say ‘Yes’, because thats the only purpose of this app.
Starting with Android 13, you will also have to provide an extra permission to allow notifications. So please active notifications for this app.
Please grant the NOTIFICATION permission in the app settings!
This app requires that your Android device supports multi-band Wifi - so 2.4 GHz as well as 5 or 6 GHz. Obviously this is not the case. Therefore please de-install it.
Open battery optimization settings to disable all optimizations for this app. This is required for Android 12 and above.
You can switch off the Wifi scanning Throttling in the Developer Options (if activated on your device).
Force Wifi 5 activated. Please open to switch to a specific Wifi access point.
Allow notifications from this app to be informed about Wifi changes.
Open the ‘Special App access’ menu and check the ’Wi-Fi Control’ settings for this app
Some phones already provide an automatic band selection. In the feature may replace this app.
Remove all suggestions for preferred Wi-Fis?
Cannot save Wi-Fi suggestions on this device.
Provide new WiFi suggestions to system?
New WiFi suggestions saved. Please be patient with Android…
Add a widget to your home screen. This gives you a chance to quickly check your current frequency.
Activate or de-activate Google Ads (Restart required)
Error loading privacy forms for AdMob
Manual mode: Please choose your preferred Wifi Access Points and click \'Save\'
